content.question: The diagram above shows the distribution of molecular speed in a sample of gas at two different temperatures, <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a correct interpretation of the information provided by the diagram?

choices.label: The average speed of the molecules is greater at <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> than at <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The taller peak corresponds to the higher temperature, <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

There are fewer molecules of gas at <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> than at <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The average kinetic energy of the molecules is greater at <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> than at <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The average kinetic energy of the molecules is greater at <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> than at <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
